site.description: The Hackystat Sensor Update Site contains feature and plug-in versions for Hackystat sensor for Eclipse project releases.

category-def.label: Hackystat sensor for Eclipse 3.x stream (from 3.0 M5)
category-def.name: EclipseSensor3x
category-def.description: This category contains the features of the Hackystat sensor for Eclipse 3.x stream (from 3.0 M5).

category-def.label: Hackystat sensor for Eclipse 2.x stream (until 3.0 M4)
category-def.name: EclipseSensor2x
category-def.description: This category contains the features of the Hackystat sensor for Eclipse 2.x stream (until 3.0 M4).
